LanguageData.Gun_HellsphereCannon.description: A ultra-high-power energy pulse projector designed for siegebreaking. The hellsphere cannon must hold a bead on its target for several seconds while charging, before it releases a devastating tsunami of power. The explosion is capable of melting conk creet in its blast radius baybee. The heat of the explosion will ignite anything nearby. It cannot fire at close-up targets.
